attributes.action: request Rhondda Cynon Taff CBC to include the retention of the current and "free to use" paddling pool in any refurbishment of Ynysangharad War Memorial Park as part of the councils HLF bid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As part of the Heritage Lottery funded renovation of Ynysyngharad War Memorial Park the plan is to move the paddling pool into the Lido and replace it with a fountain or two. 
The paddling pool is a major part of our heritage too and it should be saved in its current location and the Lido brought back to its former glory.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
